header: Isaiah’s Child Is a Sign of the Lord’s Protection of Judah

verse: Yahweh said to me, “Take a large writing tablet, and write on it with a pen: ‘Maher Shalal Hash Baz’ [The Looting Will Come Quickly; the Prey Will Be Easy].
I will have these dependable witnesses testify: the priest Uriah and Zechariah (son of Jeberechiah).”
I slept with the prophet. She became pregnant and gave birth to a son. Yahweh told me, “Name him Maher Shalal Hash Baz.
Before the boy knows how to say ‘Daddy’ or ‘Mommy,’ the wealth of Damascus and the loot from Samaria will be carried away to the king of Assyria.”

header: Assyria Will Invade, But It Will Not Conquer Judah

verse: Yahweh spoke to me again. He said,

header: Some in Jerusalem Will Stumble Because They Do Not Trust the Lord

verse: This is what Yahweh said with his powerful hand on me.
